content: The tournament Grand Prix has been moved to next weekend.
title: Tournament Date

content: Match number 4 between Debug Frogs vs Bored Gamers has been moved from room 100 to room 187a.
title: Room Change

content: Registration for the board game tournament closes this Friday. Make sure to sign up!
title: Registration Deadline

content: The opening ceremony will feature a special guest speaker from the board game industry.
title: Opening Ceremony

content: Volunteers are needed for the tournament. Sign up at the student center.
title: Volunteer Call

content: The tournament schedule has been released. Check the website for details.
title: Schedule Release

content: A new board game workshop will be held on Friday at 3 PM in room 202.
title: Workshop Announcement

content: The final match will be streamed live on the RIT channel.
title: Live Stream

content: Congratulations to the winners of the preliminary rounds!
title: Preliminary Winners

content: The board game library will be open for practice sessions all week.
title: Practice Sessions

content: Join us for a board game trivia night on Thursday at 7 PM.
title: Trivia Night

content: The tournament's closing ceremony will include awards and a raffle.
title: Closing Ceremony

content: A special exhibition match will be held featuring top players.
title: Exhibition Match

content: The board game design contest winners will be announced on Saturday.
title: Design Contest

content: Free snacks and drinks will be available for all participants.
title: Refreshments

content: The tournament's photo booth will be open from 10 AM to 4 PM.
title: Photo Booth

content: A board game swap meet will take place on Sunday afternoon.
title: Swap Meet

content: The tournament's feedback survey is now available online.
title: Feedback Survey

content: The tournament's after-party will be held at the student union.
title: After-Party

content: Thank you to all sponsors and participants for making the event possible.
title: Thank You
